items: Stand facing the keg with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Bend your knees slightly and grip the keg with both hands.
Lift the keg up to your chest and hold it close to your body.
Take a step forward with your left foot and shift your weight onto your left leg.
Swing the keg back between your legs and then explosively throw it forward and upward with both hands.
Release the keg at the top of the toss and let it fly through the air.
Repeat the exercise for the desired number of reps or time.
Improves explosive power and strength in the upper body
Targets the shoulders, back, and arms
Increases grip strength and forearm endurance
Enhances overall athletic performance and power output
Provides a fun and challenging workout
